properties.areaDesc: Imperial County Southeast; Yuma; Parker Valley; Kofa; Gila River Valley; Palo Verde Valley
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 2 at 2:53PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
At 252 PM MST/152 PM PST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong
thunderstorm over Martinez Lake, moving southwest at 10 mph.

Heavy rainfall, pea size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph will be
possible with this storm.

Locations impacted include...
Martinez Lake, Fortuna Foothills, Blaisdell, Kinter and Yuma Proving
Ground.

This includes the following highways...
AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 9 and 12.
AZ Route 95 between mile markers 29 and 59.
properties.instruction:
If on or near Martinez Lake, get out of the water and move indoors
or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles
from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close
enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not
be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SOUTHERN LA PAZ...WEST CENTRAL YUMA AND EAST CENTRAL IMPERIAL COUNTIES UNTIL 345 PM MST/245 PM PST/
